title: [Health] Traumatic brain injury among kids in US, especially girls, surged by 20% since 2000, study finds

[Medicine] In the U.S., 40 Percent of All-Cause Dementia Is Preventable. In the U.S., 12 lifestyle factors explain 41 percent of dementia cases. Obesity, hypertension, and physical inactivity accounted for half the modifiable risk.
